div.p: This field in the Bibliography Database records the place of publication of a text. Encloses a settlement and sometimes region name.

Follow MLA practice when recording place of publication: provide the name of the city or cities from the title page or other bibliographic source; if more than two cities are listed, supply the first city only; provide an abbreviation for the province, state, or country only if the name of the city is ambiguous or unfamiliar.
